content: this pattern is to make a pair of simple basic stay-on booties the booties are worked in the round from the sole up to the cuff you only need to sew up a very small seam at the sole *to make these booties totally seamless you can cast-on using judy s magic cast-on * you can either make these booties using double pointed needles or using long circular needles with magic loop method if you are new to the magic loop here is a link to a very good tutorial http //www knittinghelp com/video/play/magic-loop **gauge ** 20 stitches = 4 in stockinette stitch using the larger needle **sizes ** newborn 6 month & 12 month **sole length ** 3 5 4 4 5 inches
